positive_examples: This is an example of interior designing.
The interior designing demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed interior designing in this context.
A typical case of interior designing would involve these features.
The concept of interior designing applies here.
The process of planning and decorating indoor spaces to achieve functional and aesthetically pleasing environments.
negative_examples: This is an example of graphic designing, not interior designing.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: GraphicDesigning, or other types of Designing

definition: The practice of planning and creating functional, aesthetic indoor spaces.
